author: Kalonji Williams
comment: I've been looking everywhere for an app that allows me to freely read the Word without giving me only a verse at a time not of my choosing. This is absolutely perfect! Now we just need more translations :)

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thanks for the review. Be blessed and stay on the course!

title: This is it!

author: dp 1205
comment: Just one thing font size if it were the next size larger it will be a 5 star app my eyes aren't what they used to be. Bless You for making this app for Android wear.

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thank you David.  I'll try and make the font bigger soon.

title: Great!

author: Silgreyn Ndungwe
comment: Woow!!!!  What can i say? This is an excellent work, thank God for your efforts Developer.... This is a very good job, may God grant you the grace even to do more to His Glory.....     This a good app, well there is something missing in the book of John, there are missing scriptures, like in the book of John 3:, John 4, all  need to be updated , because they are ending on the 21st Verse but in the actual sense, they go beyond.

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thank you for the encouragement. It's greatly appreciate it. I pray blessings upon you and your family. God Bless

author: Evie Caivano
comment: It's a true Blessing 2 have the Bible on my smartwatch. It great encouragement when I'm @ work. I pray 2 see more apps like this. God bless.

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thanks, I'm blessed to hear the praise report. Be blessed....

title: A True Blessing

author: Ben G
comment: 1 of the most interesting Apps 4 Android wear.    Great stuff.
title: Boom

author: Bonnie O'Neil
comment: <--KJV only trut for me. Praise & bless God!

author: Michael W
comment: It'd be great to see the date like Tu, Sept 1, and it would be awesome to be able to remove the AM and PM. It looks much cleaner. Hopefully there's more versions in the future. Like an NIV.
title: Awesome! Just a couple things

author: Zach Turkowski
comment: Freezes on update moto 360.. still freezes at update screen, but I can bypass it
title: Won't update

author: Robert Garretson
comment: When trying to view bible it keeps stopping on lg g watch.

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Robert thanks for the feedback. Try uninstalling & reinstalling the app. Once you re install give the watch minute or 2 before running the app. It takes a minute to copy the application to the watch. Then run app on watch. Allow another minute or so to install. Since this works independent of phone it has to copy the entire bible to the watch.

author: Gergo Viczian
comment: Getting much much better on the Moto 360. I am so glad to have this. Even the search works perfectly now, just say e.g. "find peace in God".  This app in itself makes it worth to have a watch. You know, Deut 6,8:  "You shall bind them as a sign on your hand and they shall be as frontals on your forehead." I don't know about the forehead yet,,, do they talk about a Google Glass version?
title: God bless Dee

author: jonathan diaz
comment: Just an all around terrific app
title: Amazing
